meanings.definition: A small fried cake of sweetened dough, typically in the shape of a ball or ring.
meanings.sent1: I bought some delicious donuts for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells a variety of donuts every morning.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone fought over the last donut.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a donut.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked donuts filled the room.

meanings.definition: A small, ring-shaped cake made of sweetened dough, typically fried in oil.
meanings.sent1: My favorite donuts are the ones with sprinkles on top.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed eating donuts at the fair.
meanings.sent3: He juggled three donuts in the air to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night looked like a tray of glowing donuts.
meanings.sent5: The donuts at the new shop are so fluffy and delicious.
